nodes.text: The Master of Port Administration, also known as the Chairman of Utapau, was the head of state of Utapau. The office of Chairman was elected by Port Administrators of the Utapaun Committee.

As of the Battle of Coruscant, Tion Medon had been Master of Port Administration of Utapau for over two hundred years, and came from a line of distinguished Pau'ans who helped shape the planet's history. Presiding over the sinkhole spaceport of Pau City, he carried a staff fashioned from exotic alloy that was known as the Port master's walking stick. Chairman Medon was assisted by his aide, Lampay Fay. The Administrator personally welcomed Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi to the city, and warned him of General Grievous's presence on the Tenth Level.
